articles.title: Kansas vs Texas Tech: Predictions, Odds, Picks & How to Watch - Action Network
articles.description: Read for Kansas vs Texas Tech predictions, picks and odds for their college basketball game on Monday, February 2.
articles.content:
The Kansas Jayhawks take on the Texas Tech Red Raiders in Lubbock, Texas. Tip-off is set for 9 p.m. ET on ESPN.
Texas Tech is favored by 4.5 points on the spread with a moneyline of -205. The total … [+4419 chars]
